## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d735ee63af3d7bfaf8e5af37b0bd6a8034f4283ad069c65241a1c3f6c8ea7100)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@mallutrojan005/coveralls' @ 2.1.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
